raw akas.title: Wo De Qi Miao Nan You

akas: Wo De Qi Miao Nan You (original title)
My Wonderful Boyfriend World-wide (English title) (alternative title)
akas from release info: Wo De Qi Miao Nan You (original title)
My Wonderful Boyfriend World-wide (English title) (alternative title)

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Unlucky actress Tian Jing Zhi is in a car accident after being rejected by her boyfriend. During the crash, the immortal Xue Ling Qiao is awoken from his 100-year induced sleep.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Jing Zhi looks for a new roommate, and finds herself unable to turn down Ling Qiao when he shows up at her door.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Yan Zhi and Ye Chen work together to find clues to locate the dormant body. Ling Qiao tells Jing Zhi the story of how he became immortal.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Something goes wrong for Tian Jing Zhi on the set during filming. While she goes home, Xue Ling Qiao goes to investigate the painting, and things take a turn for the unexpected.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Xue Ling Qiao is trying to integrate himself into human life. Meanwhile, Tian Jing Zhi is working hard to hide her newfound utilities from her family and friends.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Tian Jing Zhi and Xue Ling Qiao's shared heartbeat is complicating things for the duo. Xue Ling Qiao is typecast for a big role in Tian Jing Zhi's drama.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: When Jing Zhi's parents unexpectedly show up, she and Ling Qiao must convince them of their relationship. Ye Chen becomes suspicious of Professor Li.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: The countdown to the reveal of the midnight monster video creeps closer to zero. Ling Qiao's involvement in a public fight causes a rift between him and Jing Zhi.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: The police investigation starts to believe the inevitablity of the monster's existence. He seems to be unbothered by their work, however, as he strives to regain his memory.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: A murder throws Jing Zhi and Ling Qiao's progress for a loop. Professor Li is presented with a new motive to find the monster.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: Yan Zhi begins to suspect Ling Qiao in the robbery-murder case. While Ling Qiao is gone, Jing Zhi finds herself in danger.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Yan Zhi continues to investigate the murder, but isn't entirely convinced that Ling Qiao is innocent. Jing Zhi is in denial about her feelings for Ling Qiao, but can't help but wear her heart on her sleeve.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: Professor Li is accurately theorizing how Tian Jing Zhi survived her accident, and he's snooping closely, as is Jerk Ye. Meanwhile, Tian Jing Zhi's feelings for the monster are only growing.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: Tian Jing Zhi is trying desperately to get Monster Xue to like her, as she has found herself fallen deeply in love. But monsters simply can't love humans. Professor Li is getting closer and closer.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Jing Zhi finds herself in peril again at Shi Guang's charity dinner. Yan Zhi finds a new and dangerous suspect to investigate.

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: Ling Qiao makes clear to Jing Zhi that her love is one-sided, and she goes out of her way to avoid him. But do his words reflect his true feelings?

17.title: Episode #1.17
17.plot: Jerk Ye is making moves to take Xuan Xuan away from her fake fiancé. With Ling Qiao moved into Feng Dong Dong's apartment, Tian Jing Zhi is trying to keep her insecurities in check.

18.title: Episode #1.18
18.plot: Professor Li takes action to acquire Ling Qiao's blood, and Jing Zhi gets sucked into his scheme.

19.title: Episode #1.19
19.plot: Yan Zhi works to figure out where Professor Li could have gone. Jing Zhi tries to get to the bottom of her and Ling Qiao's relationship.

20.title: Episode #1.20
20.plot: Jing Zhi must appease Ling Qiao for a day after her antics go too far. Ling Qiao comes up with a new plan to catch his enemy.

21.title: Episode #1.21
21.plot: Jing Zhi learns about Yan Zhi's condition and asks Ling Qiao to save him, but she soon realizes it is not a light request.

22.title: Episode #1.22
22.plot: Tian Jing Zhi is in disarray since her and Ling Qiao's breakup. Officer Li is grateful for his survival, but Jerk Ye cares less about Li's well-being and more about capturing the monster.

23.title: Episode #1.23
23.plot: As Ling Qiao prepares to leave, he and Jing Zhi have trouble revealing their true feelings to each other. Yan Zhi tries to become a romantic figure in Jing Zhi's life once again.

24.title: Episode #1.24
24.plot: With Hong Shi Long finally in his grasp, Yan Zhi is perplexed when a new suspect arises. Jing Zhi and Ling Qiao go on a trip together.

25.title: Episode #1.25
25.plot: Tian Jing Zhi wakes up in a palace, thanks to Ling Qiao. Though they've broken up, their love for each other seems strong. But their romantic getaway is stoppped short due to some disturbing news.

26.title: Episode #1.26
26.plot: As more information is uncovered, everyone begins closing in on Shi Guang's dark secrets.

27.title: Episode #1.27
27.plot: Ling Qiao and Shi Guang's past is further revealed. Yan Zhi and his team go to rescue Xuan Xuan, while Ling Qiao goes off on his own.

28.title: Episode #1.28
28.plot: In the series finale, Shi Guang uses Professor Li's quick-thinking to take his revenge on Monster Xue. The police, and Tian Jing Zhi, do everything in their power to derail these plans.

imdb.plot outline: Mutant Xue Ling Qiao, who has been asleep for centuries, is awakened by the unlucky actress Tian Jing Zhi in a car accident. He then forces his way into living at her house despite his mysterious past. On the surface, she acts like she's not bothered by his super powers, but actually, she tries her best to get rid of this "monster." Unexpectedly, their torment of each other gradually warms their relationship. This not only illuminates their romantic feelings but also reveals a shocking conspiracy that spans centuries.
imdb.title: My Amazing Boyfriend
plot: Mutant Xue Ling Qiao, who has been asleep for centuries, is awakened by the unlucky actress Tian Jing Zhi in a car accident. He then forces his way into living at her house despite his mysterious past. On the surface, she acts like she's not bothered by his super powers, but actually, she tries her best to get rid of this "monster." Unexpectedly, their torment of each other gradually warms their relationship. This not only illuminates their romantic feelings but also reveals a shocking conspiracy that spans centuries.::Anika tabassum
